attributes.action: Recognise the scale of the social and individual problems caused by requiring unemployed people not to do any work and examine alternatives as if you are a government who cares about our society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'The Devil makes work for idle hands' is a maxim that could have been written to describe our society in the United Kingdom today. Just look what we reap from our unemployment policies: Prison overcrowding, lives ruined by hard drug abuse and the crime that results from it, teenage pregnancies, general low self esteem and ambition amongst the unemployed, sub-optimal economic performance and the need for immigration. Idle unemployment is of course not the sole cause of all these ills but must surely be a major factor. Put them to work for the community and save the costs of failure.
